title: General
fullText:
Lead acid battery installations shall comply with Clauses 5.4.1 to 5.4.10 inclusive and the requirements specified in this clause.
These requirements apply to installations of all lead acid batteries whether they â€”
(a) employ removable vent caps or non-removable caps; or
(b) are "sealed" or "maintenance free" batteries; or
(c) have pressure-regulated valve vent systems with immobilized electrolyte (gel and AGM batteries).
